notesStmt.note: This file has been created by mass conversion of GRETIL's Sanskrit corpus from mand_upu.htm. Due to the heterogeneity of the sources the header markup might be suboptimal. For the sake of transparency the header of the legacy file is documented in the note element below:

MANDUKYA-UPANISAD

projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadraṃ
svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ |
svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatir dadhātu ||

body.p:
Verse 1
omityetadakṣaramidaṃ sarvaṃ tasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhūtaṃ
bhavadbhaviṣyaditi sarvamoṅkāra eva |
yaccānyattrikālātītaṃ tadapyoṅkāra eva ||
Verse 2 sarvaṃ hyetad brahmāyamātmā brahma so 'yamātmā catuṣpāt ||

Verse 5
yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na
kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati tatsuṣuptam |
suṣuptasthāna ekībhūtaḥ prajñānaghana evānandamayo
hyānandabhukcetomukhaḥ prājñastṛtīyaḥ pādah ||
Verse 6 eṣa sarveśvara eṣa sarvajña eṣo 'ntaryāmyeṣa yoniḥ sarvasya prabhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām

lg.l: bahiḥ prajño vibhurviśvo hyantaḥ prajñastu taijasaḥ |
ghanaprajñastathā prājña eka eva tridhā smṛtaḥ ||
ākāśe ca hydi prājñastridhā dehe vyavasthitaḥ ||
sthūlaṃ tarpayate viśvaṃ praviviktaṃ tu taijasam |
ānandaśca tathā prājñaṃ tridhā tṛptiṃ nibodhata ||
triṣu dhāmasu yadbhojyaṃ bhoktā yaśca prakīrtitaḥ |
vedaitadubhayaṃ yastu sa bhuñjāno na lipyate ||

body.p:
Verse 7 nāntaḥ prajñaṃ na bahiḥ prajñaṃ nobhayataḥ prajñaṃ na prajñānaghanaṃ na prajñaṃ nāprajñam |
adṛśyamavyavahāryamagrāhyamalakṣaṇamacintyamavyapa
deśyamekātmapratyayasāraṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śāntaṃ
śivamadvaitaṃ caturthaṃ manyante sa ātmā sa vijñeyaḥ ||

lg.l: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhastu dvau tau turye na siddhytaḥ ||
nātmānaṃ na paraṃ caiva na satyaṃ nāpi cānṛtam |
bījanidrāyutaḥ prājñaḥ sā ca turye na vidyate ||
na nidrāṃ naiva ca svapnaṃ turye paśyanti niścitāḥ ||
prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ |
upadeśādayaṃ vādo jñāte dvaitaṃ na vidyate ||
pādā mātrā mātrāśca pādā akāra ukāro makāra iti ||

body.p:
Verse 9
jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaro 'kāraḥ prathamā
mātrāpterādimattvādvāpnoti ha vai sarvān
kāmānādiśca bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||

Verse 10
svapnasthānastaijasa ukāro dvitīyā mātrotkarṣād
ubhayatvādvotkarṣati ha vai jñānasantatiṃ samānaśca
bhavati nāsyābrahmavitkule bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||

lg.l: minoti ha vā idaṃ sarvamapītiśca bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
triṣu dhāmasu yastulyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vetti niścitaḥ |
makāraśca punaḥ prājñaṃ nāmātre vidyate gatiḥ ||

body.p:
Verse 12
amātraścaturtho 'vyavahāryaḥ prapañcopaśamaḥ śivo 'dvaita
evamoṅkāra ātmaiva saṃviśatyātmanātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda |
ya evaṃ veda ||

lg.l: oṅkāraṃ pādaśo vidyātpādā mātrā na saṃśayaḥ |
oṅkāraṃ pādaśo jñātvā na kiñcidapi cintayet ||
yuñjīta praṇave cetaḥ praṇavo brahma nirbhayam |
praṇave nityayuktasya na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit ||
praṇavo hyaparaṃ brahma praṇavaśca paraḥ smṛtaḥ |
evaṃ hi praṇavaṃ jñātvā vyaśnute tadanantaram ||
oṅkāro vidito yena sa munirnetaro janaḥ ||
